Reference

All functions

addURL()

Add a URL

addWebIcon()

Add a web icon.

adjustString()

Adjust the size of a character string to a given number of characters

aggregateCol()

Aggregate columns

applyString()

Apply a function on elements of a character string

assignClass2df()

Assign a class to a set of column of a data frame

assignIds()

Assign an id to a list of characters or factors

categorize()

Assign categories to a vector of values.

dfTemplate() dfTemplateMatch()

Create a data frame from scratch or based on one or two data frames.

duplicateRow() duplicateCol()

Duplicates elements of a data frame.

findRef()

Find citation tags.

findReplace() grepReplace()

Find and replace

findThem()

Find values in a given vector.

gaussianShape()

Flexible bell-shaped function.

getDigits()

Extract digits from a character vector.

keepWords()

Keep these words.

logistic() logistic2()

Logistic functions

loremIpsum()

Lorem ipsum.

meanAlong()

Compute the mean along a vector

multiMatch()

Mutiple match.

packagesUsed()

Get a data frame of package and their installed version.

readYamlHeader()

Reads YAML headers.

scaleWithin()

Scale a set of values

setColClass()

Set class of data frames columns

signifSymbols()

A simple function to associated p-values with symbols.

squaretize()

Makes a data frame or a matrix square.

stApply()

Apply a function on elements of a character string

substrBib()

Substract Bibtex entries.

whichIs()

Search values or patterns in a vector

wordCount()

Count words
